name: Obsidian Monast Sugatra
description: An exclusive sugatra shrouded in the bluest of blues.

languages.description: Ein exklusives Sugatra, gehüllt in das blaueste Blau.
languages.name: Obsidian Monast Sugatra

languages.description: Une Sugatra exclusive drapée du plus profond des bleus.
languages.name: Sugatra Monast Obsidienne

languages.description: Una sugatra esclusiva avvolta nel più profondo dei blu.
languages.name: Sugatra Monast Obsidian

languages.description: Una sugatra exclusiva envuelta en el más azul de los azules.
languages.name: Sugatra Monast de Obsidiana

languages.description: 一件被最蓝的蓝色所覆盖的专属坠饰。
languages.name: 黑曜石修道院坠饰

languages.description: Эта эксклюзивная сугатра инкрустирована синее синего.
languages.name: Сугатра: Монаст Обсидиан

languages.description: 最の蒼に覆われた限定スガトラ。
languages.name: Obsidian Monast スガトラ

languages.description: Uma Sugatra exclusiva, envolta no mais azul dos azuis existentes.
languages.name: Sugatra Obsidiana Monast

languages.description: 一件被最藍的藍色調所包裹的專屬墜飾。
languages.name: 黑曜石修道院墜飾

languages.description: สุกัตราสุดพิเศษที่คลุมไปด้วยสีน้ำเงินที่เข้มที่สุด
languages.name: สุกัตรา Obsidian Monast

languages.description: Maviliğin mavisi ile gizlenmiş çok özel bir sugatra.
languages.name: Obsidian Monast Sugatra
